meanings.definition: The number that is one more than ten.
meanings.sent1: I counted to eleven before stopping.
meanings.sent2: There are eleven cookies in the jar.
meanings.sent3: Why did the baker only bake eleven cupcakes?
meanings.sent4: The clock struck eleven, signaling the end of the day.
meanings.sent5: She won eleven marbles in the game.

meanings.definition: A team of eleven players in a sports game.
meanings.sent1: The soccer team had eleven players on the field.
meanings.sent2: Eleven athletes competed in the relay race.
meanings.sent3: The coach selected eleven players for the match.
meanings.sent4: The team's unity was evident with eleven players working together.
meanings.sent5: The basketball team scored eleven points in the first quarter.
